TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CompositeDuplexBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public NotInheritable Class CompositeDuplexBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IPolicyExportExtension
type CompositeDuplexBindingElement = class inherit BindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension

summary.span: 表示一个绑定元素，客户端在必须公开一个终结点以使服务可以将消息发送回客户端时使用。

span.span: Represents the binding element that is used when the client must expose an endpoint for the service to send messages back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 它通常与本身不允许进行双工通信的传输（例如，HTTP）一起使用。This is commonly used with transports, such as HTTP, that do not allow duplex communications natively. 与此相反，TCP 本身允许进行双工通信，因此不要求服务在将消息发送回客户端时使用此绑定元素。TCP, by contrast, does allow duplex communications natively and so does not require the use of this binding element for the service to send messages back to a client. 客户端必须公开一个地址，使服务能以该地址与其进行联系，并在服务与客户端之间建立连接。The client must expose an address at which the service can contact it to establish a connection from the service to the client. 此客户端地址由 属性提供。This client address is provided by the property. 请注意，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 自动生成如果其中一个未显式设置用户。Note that Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) auto-generates a if one is not explicitly set by the user.

summary.span: 获取或设置客户端的基址。

span.span: Gets or sets the base address for the client.

value.span: 一个包含客户端基址的 。

span.span: A that contains the base address for the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该属性提供一个地址，服务可以通过这个地址与客户端取得联系。This property provides an address at which the service can contact the client. `null` 值导致系统自动生成一个客户端基址。A `null` value causes the system to automatically generate a client base address. 这是一个基址，并不是绝对地址。This is a base address, not an absolute address. 从该绑定生成客户端终结点时，GUID 会追加到基址。A GUID is appended to the base address when generating client endpoints from this binding.

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement Clone() cil managed
Public Overrides Function Clone () As BindingElement
public: override System::ServiceModel::Channels::BindingElement ^ Clone();
override this.Clone : unit -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement

summary.span: 返回当前绑定元素的深层克隆。

span.span: Returns a deep clone of the current binding element.

returns.span: 一个 ，它是当前绑定元素的深层克隆。

span.span: A that is a deep clone of the current binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通过返回克隆，运行时将能够支持多个自定义绑定共用一个自定义绑定元素的情况。Returning a clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果未返回克隆，则运行时行为将不可确定。If a clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 对象的深层克隆创建对象的副本以及该对象直接或间接引用的所有内容的副本。A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. （这也称为复制整个对象图。）相比之下，对象的浅表克隆只是对象本身的副本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果对象包含对其他对象的引用，则浅表复制不创建所引用对象的副本，而是仅复制对原始对象的引用。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects. 尤其是， 的深层副本会复制完 值。In particular, a deep copy of copies over the value.

span.span: The typed object whose support is being tested.

param.name: context
param.span: 用于提供生成通道所需上下文的 。

span.span: The that provides the context required to build the channel.

summary.span: 返回其中一个通道堆栈的适当层所请求的类型化对象。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested from the appropriate layer in one of the channel stacks.

returns.span: 如果受支持，则为所请求的类型化对象 ；否则，为 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is supported; or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可从堆栈绑定的适当层请求一个类型化对象，如用于设置属性或获取状态的接口。Use this to request a typed object, such as an interface for setting properties or getting status, from the appropriate layer in the stacked binding. 如果某个层支持返回所请求的对象，则该层会返回对象。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支持，则该层会将调用委托给堆栈中的下一层。If not, it delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到达堆栈底部仍然没有层支持所请求的对象，则向调用方返回 `null` 值。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no layer supports getting the requested object then the caller is returned a `null` value.

span.span: is .
